name: CityGhosts
description:
I present my new game on Android. It is adventure of nice guy in the dark city.  He looks like a good ghost of an animal. And he wants to free the city from the aggressors. The aggressors are evil ghosts. They want to keep the city in the dark and fog, forever... But when our good guy destroys all evil ghosts, and the dawn comes back in the city.

Destroy all evil ghosts and help the city to be free! Control of walrus or shark, fly between the buildings. Gain power to make your hero and his shots bigger! Enemies can come and shoot at you from different sided. Don't forget, each hero has its own unique magic!

There are 4 city and 2 heros. However, the way to the end will not be easy!
